Producer: Leslie Urdang, Tom Hulce, Robert Salerno
Production Co: Sony Pictures Classics, Hyde Park Entertainment, Artina Films
Rating: PG-13 (Drug Use|A Scene of Violence|Partial Nudity|Some Mature Thematic Elements)
Synopsis: At a picturesque lakeside estate, a love triangle unfolds between the diva Irina, her lover Boris, and the ingenue Nina.
Title: The Seagull
